text:
e="preserve">Ivan Havrylovich Bogdan (; February 29, 1928 – December 25, 2020) was an Ukrainian wrestler. He was born in Dmytro-Bilivka, Ukrainian SSR. He won an Olympic gold medal in 1960. He won gold medals at the 1958 and 1961 World Wrestling Championships.
Bogdan died on December 25, 2020 at the age of 92.
